nodes.text: Ronin: A Visions Novel is a forthcoming unabridged audio version of the canon novel of the same name, written by Emma Mieko Candon. It is scheduled to be released by Random House Audio on October 12, 2021, coinciding with the publication of the novel.
A stunning original novel inspired by the upcoming Star Wars Visions [sic] animated anthology series. Experience Star Wars like never before.
